about-me.description:
Hi, I'm Demis. I'm passionate about software development because I love the mix of creativity and logical thinking. Every project is a new opportunity to turn complex problems into clear and efficient solutions. My inspiration comes from constantly learning and refining my code to make it more elegant step by step. 

 Let's bring ideas to life and create something remarkable together!
about-me.title: About me

skills.title: Skill set
skills.description: I am passionate about building modern and responsive web applications. My focus is on creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly interfaces. I continuously explore new tools and frameworks to expand my skill set.
